rules.title: Determine Patient Status
rules.action: Ask if patient is new or established.
rules.example: Are you a new patient or have you visited us before?

rules.title: Acknowledge Patient Status
rules.example: Thank you for letting me know you're an established patient.

rules.title: Verify Established Patient
rules.action: Request identifying information (e.g., phone number, date of birth, or name) to locate or verify their patient chart.
rules.example: To pull up your chart, could I please get your date of birth or phone number?

rules.title: Inform Chart Retrieval
rules.condition: Agent needs to retrieve patient chart.
rules.action: Inform customer about chart retrieval and potential brief hold.
rules.example: Please bear with me for a moment while I retrieve your chart, I may need to place you on a brief hold.

rules.title: Ascertain Appointment Reason
rules.condition: Patient's status and identity (if applicable) are confirmed.
rules.action: Ask for the specific reason or type of appointment.
rules.example: What is the reason for your visit today?

rules.title: Handle Unprovided Service
rules.condition: Patient requests a service not offered by the facility.
rules.action: Inform the patient the service is not provided and offer alternative contact information.
rules.example: Unfortunately, we don't offer that specific service here. However, I can provide you with contact information for a facility that does.

rules.title: Request Preferred Appointment Times
rules.condition: Service type is confirmed and provided by the facility.
rules.action: Ask for preferred dates and times for the appointment.
rules.example: Great, what dates and times work best for your appointment?

rules.title: Offer Specific Appointment Slots
rules.condition: After receiving general preferred dates and times from the patient and checking schedule availability.
rules.action: Offer specific available date and time options.
rules.example: Based on your preference for Monday afternoon, I have an opening at 2:00 PM or 3:30 PM. Which one works for you?

rules.title: Confirm Appointment Details
rules.condition: After the patient has selected a specific appointment date and time.
rules.action: Restate the chosen appointment details to the patient for confirmation.
rules.example: Just to confirm, you'd like to book the appointment for Monday, October 26th at 2:00 PM. Is that correct?

rules.title: Confirm Appointment Location
rules.condition: As part of the final appointment confirmation process, especially if multiple locations are possible or implied.
rules.action: Ask the patient to confirm the desired appointment location.
rules.example: And will this appointment be at our downtown clinic location?

rules.title: Place Caller On Hold
rules.condition: Agent needs to retrieve information or transfer the call to an appropriate department.
rules.action: Inform the caller about the hold and the reason, then place them on hold.
rules.example: I need to look up that information for you. May I place you on a brief hold?
